text:
Let's learn English with the 
hit Netflix fantasy The Witcher.

So today's clip comes from Season 2.
Now, don't worry! As long as you've

seen Season 1 there won't be any spoilers.
Now if you have never seen The Witcher but

you're still interested then you may 
want to check out this one instead.

And before we start, every week we release 
lessons to help intermediate and advanced

learners just like you to improve 
their English in a fun and dynamic way.

Without getting lost, without missing 
the jokes and without subtitles, so if

you're new here then make sure that you join 
our community of over 5 million learners by

hitting that Subscribe button and the Bell down 
below, so that you don't miss any new lessons.

Expressions like "the plot thickens" 
can be pretty tricky because,

even if you understand each individual 
word, you can miss the figurative meaning.

But we natives use these expressions all the time, 
so if you want to understand TV series, music,

podcasts or even have a conversation, then 
you need to memorize many expressions.

And that's one of the reasons why we 
created our Fluent with Friends Course.

In this course you can learn 
thousands of the words and

expressions that natives use every 
day, and have a ton of fun doing it.

We want you to try it yourself, so 
we have this free 3-Part Masterclass

that you can join now just click here or in 
the description down below to get started.

And get ready to take your 
fluency to the next level!

Aww yeah, I hope you've enjoyed today's lesson!
You know so many of my students have told me

that they understand me just fine 
in our classes but then when they

listen to a podcast, or they get in a group 
conversation say that natives just speak

so fast and they just feel lost.
In this lesson we give you 5

Secrets to help you to understand fast 
English! Let's check out a clip now.
